Description: The score given to each movie on IMDB (score is out of 100)
The release date for the movie
The names of the crew who worked on the movie
The original title of the movies (more applicable to movies that are not in English and were translated)
The status of the movie (released or unreleased)
The original language the movie is in
The budget of the movie (in dollars)
The revenue of the movie (in dollars)
The number of negative words found in the overview
The number of positive words found in the overview
The overall sentiment of the the movies' overview, either Positive, Negative, or Neutral
The number of genres for each movie
